casebody.data:
Stanley G. MARKUSEN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. GENERAL ANILINE & FILM CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant. No. 277, Docket 23481. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued April 12, 1955. Decided April 25, 1955. Nathan H. Elman, New York City (Klein, Wikler & Gottlieb, New York City, on the brief), for plaintiff-appellee. Herbert L. Abrons, New York City (Kathryn V. Crean, New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellant.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, and FRANK and HASTIE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the memorandum opinion of District Judge Kaufman in denying defendant a judgment notwithstanding the verdict or a new trial, 16 F.R.D. 455.
